body: So you're telling me that this gets to have 200+ pages, two animations and a decent following and still nobody bothered to translate this gem? what kind of bullshit even is this? this is genuinely disappointing. it's gonna take me at least 5 more years until i can actually read Japanese and understand it. dammit!!
The boobs in the H-Anime lack the finesse of the manga art, not to mention, they also lack suppleness and the effects of gravity. SAD.
This artist is amazing. Can't wait for a translation. Thanks!!
When is the english version coming out?
